item.title: Metaphysical Metro - Jun 10,2012
item.description:
Metaphysical Metro North Texas Holistic & Spiritual Happenings Join host Mary Catherine Miller each Sunday at 3 PM Central Time for an update on events of interest to the metaphysical community of the DFW Metroplex. Metaphysical Metro Calendar Is your event posted? http://NurseHealer.com/MM These are just a few of the places to watch for some fabulous events: (in no particular order) Positive Touch Enterprises The Rabbit Hole Miracles of Joy Crystal Source Spiritual Fitness Center Center for Spiritual Living Metaphysical Way Power of the Rainbow Soul Revelations Light Workers Sanctuary

item.title: Metaphysical Metro March 25, 2012 - Mar 25,2012
item.description:
Metaphysical Metro North Texas Holistic & Spiritual Happenings Join host Mary Catherine Miller each Sunday at 3 PM Central Time for an update on events of interest to the metaphysical community of the DFW Metroplex. 3/25/2012 - My apoligies that todays show is a repeat of last weeks show. I am unable to record a new show today due to acute bronchitis with asthmatic exacerbation. There are some special events this week that were not in the show recording. For the full calendar of local events and the FaceBook page, see http://NurseHealer.com/MM There are improvements planned for Metaphysical Metro in the near future. These include: Technical improvements - New microphone and video spots; all new announcements Content improvements - Interviews with event hosts, speakers and facilitators Accessibility improvements - Besides listening on BlogTalk Radio and iTunes, links to all shows will be available from one web page For all Metaphysical Metro news and information,see http://NurseHealer.com/MM

item.title: Divine Purpose Guidework # 2 Life Purpose - Feb 05,2012
item.description:
Chapter 2 - Life Purpose (Life Path) The search for your life purpose corresponds to the search for the meaning of life. The meaning of life is what it means to you at this time. It is for this lifetime. So, to know the meaning of life, you need to know yourself. Your life purpose is the focus of this life and the blueprint for your future. It is the reason you chose and agreed to the circumstances of this incarnation. To know your life purpose, know what matters most to you. What drives your passion, inspires your thoughts and intrigues your soul does so because it is the spark of connection deep within your soul that nudges you to move in the path of your purpose of life. * Spiritual Practice: Dreaming with Purpose Imagine being able to tap into your subconscious mind while you sleep to unlock your potential for creativity and resourcefulness to improve your life! Dreaming with Purpose is a tool to inspire you to tap into your inner creativity, resourcefulness, ingenuity and imagination to solve, resolve, decide, create and achieve whatever you desire. More on this class HERE. Divine Purpose Guidework: A Soul Work Handbook For Personal and Professional Soul Progression * Inner Wisdom * Prescience * Life & Eternal Purpose * Receiving Divine Guidance By Mary Catherine Miller The twelve chapters of the book will each have an online class to introduce it.

item.title: Divine Purpose Guidework # 1 - Intuition - Jan 01,2012
item.description:
Divine Purpose Guidework: A Soul Work Handbook For Personal and Professional Soul Progression This online class begins the study of Divine Purpose Guidework and lays the groundwork for the workshops to be held in March, June and September at Positive Touch Enterprises, Incorporated in Richardson, Texas. This Divine Purpose GuideworkTM Class introduces the concept and first chapter of the book, "Divine Purpose Guidework" (A Soul Work Handbook For Personal and Professional Soul Progression), Intuition. Everyone has intuition. Whether you are someone who just has a "hunch" now and then or a professional who relies on intuition in your career, this class can aid you in developing, strengthening and trusting your intuition. Your intuition is your inner guidance system, your compass, that lights your path and enlightens your mind. It is the tool you need for every step of your life journey. Fine tuning your intuition brings clarity and confidence to every choice, every decision and every experience in life. Discover, develop and learn to trust your intuition. * Spiritual Practice: Meditation Meditation is a spiritual practice that promotes well-being and awakening of consciousness. Meditation is quieting the mind and allowing. It may seem impossible at times to quiet the active mind because so many thoughts are intrusive. Acknowledge and be grateful for each thought, set it aside, and center. Clearing the mind clears the way for deeper spiritual experiences. 1st Sunday ~ 2 PM Central Time DivinePurposeGuidework.com

item.title: Sacred Space - Dec 04,2011
item.description:
This class is on the sacred space that we are and that we exist within. As we accept and honor the sacredness of life, we bring the sacred into all that we do. We may think of sacred places, such as a church or burial ground. We may rightfully regard our homes as sacred when we treat them with respect and honor. But there is sacredness in life itself. To be sacred is to be declared holy, worthy of respect, dedicated or devoted to a purpose, consecrated. We may not always think of life in this way; but it appropriate and honorable to do so. When we consider life sacred, we cannot hate another, for within them is sacredness. We give honest sincere appreciation for the food we eat, being thankful for the plants and animals whose sacred purpose it was to provide our food. Considering the sacredness of life in every moment is choosing a way of life, an approach to meeting each life experience in every moment. It is recognizing that our home is holy ground, and honoring it as such. With this mindset, recognizing that we maneuver through life in the sacred space of our existence surrounds us with peace and calm in the midst of any life experience and provides clarity, hope, and joy. Class Outlines are available from NurseHealer.com with all class resources. Download or purchase audio, video, and written materials at NurseHealer.com.

item.description:
This class is on the practical application of aromatherapy in our daily lives. Learn to use herbal essential oils and blends to make your own massage oil, body lotion, scented talc, sachets, and more. You will receive a number of simple easy-to-make herbal formulas for practical use in your home and with your family, friends, and loved ones. Practical Aromatherapy Class Outline: http://nursehealer.com/Practical_Aromatherapy_Outline.htm NurseHealer.com: http://nursehealer.com

item.title: Divine Purpose - Oct 02,2011
item.description:
Divine purpose is what many call "the meaning of life." It is the souls purpose, the divinely inspired intent of this incarnation. Understanding divine purpose clarifies lifes priorities and guides us in ways to navigate life with grace and assurance. Divine purpose is not only the intent of the Creator; but your innermost highest intent of your soul. aligning with divine purpose puts us in the flow of Creation wherein we feel inner peace, joy and hope. Following the path of divine purpose is the most fulfilling experience we can have in this life. It is completing our destiny and so much more. It is being who we truly are in all our glory to the fullest extent of our being for the most benevolent benefit for ourselves, mankind and our world. It is serving Spirit by fulfilling our life mission. Living our divine purpose brings us into alignment with Divine nature and into harmony with the vibration of the universe. Know your divine purpose and follow the signs to fulfill your divine plan. Class Outline and Resource Links Divine Purpose Guidework LINK Co-Host Ashley Gail Class Outlines are available from NurseHealer.com with all class resources. Vote on or suggest future classes at nursehealer.com/classes (and click on “Survey.”) Download or purchase audio, video, and written materials at NurseHealer.com.

item.title: SOUL WORK Online Workshop - Sep 25,2011
item.description:
SOUL WORK is a workshop online supporting S.O.U.L. Clinic studies. The Science of Understanding Life (S.O.U.L.) Clinic course is a 12-lesson course in psychology offered through the Universal Life Church (ULC) that is designed to qualify you as a ministerial counselor. Three required textbooks may be obtained through local libraries or book stores. This course consists of resources from many fields including Psychology, Metaphysics, Christianity, Eastern and Western religious writings, counseling, guidance and practical information; all relating to the problems of life and how to overcome them. A S.O.U.L. Workshop Outline and Resources * NOTE: SOUL WORK is not directly associated with the S.O.U.L. Clinic Course or the Universal Life Church. This workshop is intended to complement S.O.U.L. Clinic studies for students previously or currently enrolled in the S.O.U.L. Clinic Course. Enrollment in the course is available on the ULC website. * LINKS: Universal Life Church (ULC) - http://www.ulc.net/ -- S.O.U.L. Clinic Course - http://www.ulc.net/index.php?page=shop&cat=17 Download or purchase audio, video, and written materials at NurseHealer.com.

item.title: Spiritual Discernment - Aug 28,2011
item.description:
I Corinthians 12: 10 - "To another the working of miracles; to another prophecy; to another discerning of spirits..." One of the Gifts of the Holy Spirit is discerning of spirits. Why would be given the gift to discern spirits if we had no need to encounter them? It is wonderful that God in his infinite wisdom has seen fit to bless us with this gift. God pours out the Holy Spirit to us. He never intended for us to be left all alone in the world in darkness. The Holy Spirit is our light in the darkness. Acts 2: 17 - "And it shall come to pass in the last days, saith God, I will pour out of my Spirit upon all flesh: and your sons and your daughters shall prophesy, and your young men shall see visions, and your old men shall dream dreams" Luke 12: 2 (2-3) - "For there is nothing covered, that shall not be revealed; neither hid, that shall not be known." Sermon Script and Links Musical Selections: “Come Holy Spirit” by Paul Lisney “Peace Within” by Kevin Wood “Spirit Come” by David Ballard “Divine Inspiration” by von Baron

item.title: How Spirit Communicates - Aug 07,2011
item.description:
What is Spirit? Spirit is all that is beyond the physical. We are spirit; those who have crossed over are spirit; angels, guides and light beings are spirit; the energy of chi is spirit; divine beings are spirit; the essence of flowers and plants is spirit; soul is spirit; and the life force of all that exists is spirit. Spirit communicates through coincidences and synchronicities, visual stimuli, diverting your attention, auditory sounds and words, music both auditory and the music of nature, sensations, chills and touches, smells and tastes, animals in your awareness, plants that come into your thoughts, gemstones and colors that present themselves to you and anything or anyone who shows up in your life. Spirit may communicate for your protection, for healing, for personal development, for achieving specific goals, for fulfilling your divine purpose, for mending wounds and relationships, for teaching life lessons, for imparting wisdom and knowledge, for bringing balance and harmony, and for many other honorable purposes. Class Outline and Resources Co-Host Ashley Gail Class Outlines are available from NurseHealer.com with all class resources. item.title: Enlightened Adversity Sunday Sermon - Jul 10,2011
item.description:
Our mindset is often one of avoiding adversity at all costs. We desire to avoid illness, discomfort, distress and emotional anguish. We are willing to try almost anything available in order to be free of these unpleasant experiences. A life free of adversity is a blessing of great value. And adversity in our lives is of magnificent value. Adversity forces change and ultimately leads to personal growth, enlightened understanding and both physical and spiritual development. ... When we can allow rather than resist, we open ourselves to an impetus to enlightenment that nothing else can provide. Moving forward with grace and ease is accepting adversity with gratitude and peace. Sermon Transcript: NurseHealer Universal Life Church Seminary Opening Song: “Healing” by Jeremy Gimbel and Shira Tirdof Ending Music: “Blessings” by Nathan Long “Overcomer” by Jessica Smith Wright “Stronghold” by John DeGrazio “Blessing and Honor” by David Delgado

item.title: Decisive Action for Life Direction - Jun 05,2011
item.description:
This class is on taking decisive action for life direction. Decisiveness is the key to moving forward with confidence. Our inner insecurities that are based on unpleasant past experiences and anxiety about unwanted consequences keep us in a quandary of indecisiveness at times. Learn simple basic principles of resoluteness, ways to identify your triggers and how to devise a purposeful plan of action for any decision you may face. A simple concept I was taught many years ago is that we should worry less about making the "right" decision and accept that many decisions we make are not between right and wrong; but between this and that. So if we allow ourselves to move forward and MAKE a decision with the resolve to MAKE IT RIGHT, then we always make the "right" decision. Learn to strengthen your ability to be decisive with clear volition and authority. Know yourself. Trust yourself. Honor yourself. Believe yourself. These four simple phrases can empower you to be decisive and take action to propel your life in the direction of your choosing. Class Outline Co-Host Ashley Gail Vote on or suggest future classes at nursehealer.com/classes (click on “Survey.”) Download or purchase audio, video, and written materials at NurseHealer.com.

item.title: Developing a Personal Mission Statement - May 01,2011
item.description:
This class is on developing a personal mission statement or vision statement. A personal mission statement is a description of your values, interests, hopes and aspirations. It is the definitive synopsis of the focus of your life and the blueprint for your future. Composing your personal mission statement and electing to pattern your life around it empowers you with clarity, decisiveness, insight and foresight, and guides you gracefully through lifes challenges and transitions. Formulation of a mission statement requires deep contemplation, thorough evaluation and thoughtful expression to produce a precise written expression of our divine purpose. Your mission statement becomes the architecture of the intentional application of your vision and values. It is the benchmark for everything in your life. Following the simple steps you will learn in this class, you will be able to develop a compelling personal mission statement. Co-Host Ashley Gail Outline, Exercises and Resources Vote on or suggest future classes at nursehealer.com/classes (click on “Survey.”) Download or purchase audio, video, and written materials at NurseHealer.com.

item.title: Mastering Fear - Apr 03,2011
item.description:
This is a class on mastering fear in your life. Healthy fear is our early warning system that guides us to make wiser decisions. A little healthy fear keeps us from making foolish mistakes. For example, it is healthy fear that prevents us from sticking our hand in an open flame and being burned. Unhealthy fear pushes us beyond what is beneficial for us into actions or the lack of action that impedes our personal progress. Unhealthy fear stifles or even paralyzes us with panic, irrational fear and anxiety. In the extreme example, unhealthy fear of fire might prevent us from being able to light a match, even in times of need. Learn to recognize and express gratitude for healthy fear that serves your best interest and to distinguish when fear is at or approaching the unhealthy state. Learn to manage and master your fears to move forward with your plans, hopes and dreams in safety and with confidence. Co-Host Ashley Gail Mastering Fear Class Outline and Resources Class Outlines are available at NurseHealer.com with all class resources. item.title: Feng Shui for Your Sacred Space - Mar 06,2011
item.description:
This class is on Feng Shui for your sacred space. Learn how to set up your Ba Gua map for your home, office or place of worship. Each direction and corner has sacred characteristics to adhere to. Know the purpose, color, shape and sacred animal for each. Discover the cures for problem areas and the traps to avoid. Feng Shui (pronounced fung schway), literally translated as wind and water, is the Chinese tradition of geomancy using structures on the landscape in harmony with earth energies. Feng Shui is the philosophy and spiritual approach to architecture and interior design for the purpose of physical and spiritual well-being and balance. It is art of object placement in spatial arrangement and orientation in relation to patterns of yin and yang and the flow of energy (qi). Co-Host Ashley Gail Feng Shui Class Outline and Resources Class Outlines are available at NurseHealer.com with all class resources. Vote on or suggest future classes at nursehealer.com/classes (click on “Survey.”) Download or purchase audio, video, and written materials at NurseHealer.com.

Each direction and corner has sacred characteristics to adhere to. Know the purpose, color, shape and sacred animal for each. Discover the cures for problem areas and the traps to avoid. Feng Shui (pronounced fung schway), literally translated as wind and water, is the Chinese tradition of geomancy using structures on the landscape in harmony with earth energies. Feng Shui is the philosophy and spiritual approach to architecture and interior design for the purpose of physical and spiritual well-being and balance. It is art of object placement in spatial arrangement and orientation in relation to patterns of yin and yang and the flow of energy (qi). Co-Host Ashley Gail Feng Shui Class Outline and Resources Class Outlines are available at NurseHealer.com with all class resources. item.description:
Classes on BlogTalk Radio

30-Minute mini Classes are broadcast on BlogTalk Radio on the first Sunday of every month at 2 PM Central Time, and the archives are available for listening online anytime.

Upcoming Monthly Classes on BlogTalk Radio in 2011 include:

  • January 2 - Ascension
  • February 6 – Know Your Guides
  • March 6 – Feng Shui for Your Sacred Space
  • April 3 – Mastering Fear
  • May 1 – Developing a Personal Mission Statement
  • June 5 – Decisive Action for Life Direction
  • July 3 – Dreams, Dreaming and Dreamers
  • August 7 – How Spirit Communicates
  • September 4 – Protection, Blessing and Smudging
  • October 2 – Divine Purpose
  • November 6 – Practical Aromatherapy
  • December 4 – Sacred Space

Class descriptions, outlines and resources are available on NurseHealer.com

Workshops on BlogTalk Radio

2-hour workshops will be broadcast on BlogTalk Radio twice a year in February and August on the 3rd Sunday at 2 PM Central Time.

Upcoming Workshops on BlogTalk Radio in 2011 include:

February 20, 2011 at 2 PM Central Time –
SPIRIT WORK is a two-hour workshop online supporting the Spirit-Quest eight-month home study course offered through the Universal Life Church (ULC) Seminary Program. This course is designed to put you on the fast track to spiritual fulfillment through spiritual growth and understanding.

  • * NOTE: SPIRIT WORK is not directly associated with the Spirit-Quest Home Study Course or the Universal Life Church. This workshop is intended to complement the Spirit-Quest home studies for students previously or currently enrolled in the Spirit-Quest Home Study Course. Enrollment in the course is available on the ULC Seminary website. *

August 21, 2011 at 2 PM Central Time –
SOUL WORK is a two-hour workshop online supporting S.O.U.L. Clinic studies. The Science of Understanding Life (S.O.U.L.) Clinic course is a 12-lesson course in psychology offered through the Universal Life Church (ULC) that is designed to qualify you as a ministerial counselor. Three required textbooks may be obtained through local libraries or book stores. This course consists of resources from many fields including Psychology, Metaphysics, Christianity, Eastern and Western religious writings, counseling, guidance and practical information; all relating to the problems of life and how to overcome them.  A S.O.U.L. Clinic License is issued by the Universal Life Church upon completion of the course.

  • * NOTE: SOUL WORK is not directly associated with the S.O.U.L. Clinic Course or the Universal Life Church. This workshop is intended to complement S.O.U.L. Clinic studies for students previously or currently enrolled in the S.O.U.L. Clinic Course. Enrollment in the course is available on the ULC website.

Workshop descriptions, outlines and resources are available on NurseHealer.com

item.title: Preparedness - Dec 05,2010
item.description:
This class is on preparedness as a way of life. You will learn how to prepare a 72-hour emergency kit (and why), food storage basics (including shelflife), and how to develop a preparedness mindset. There is no need for fear when you have considered many of the what-ifs, resolved a manageable contingency plan for potential challenges, and allowed trust to bring you peace of mind. Preparedness instills within us trust of ourselves, trust of our intuition, trust of our decisions both pre-established and in the moment, and trust of a higher power. When challenge arrives, you can choose fear or faith. The preparedness mindset is one of faith. Preparedness Class Outline and Resources Class Outlines are available at NurseHealer.com with all class resources. item.description:
Online NurseHealer Class Archive on BlogTalk Radio

Classes and workshops on healing, spirituality, preparedness and the paranormal - Catch the next scheduled 30-minute mini class online at 2 PM Central time on the first Sunday of the month, or listen online anytime to shows in the archives.

Practical Aromatherapy Class Online (BlogTalk Radio Show Archive)
This class is on the practical application of aromatherapy in our daily lives. Learn to use herbal essential oils and blends to make your own massage oil, body lotion, scented talc, sachets, and more. You will receive a number of simple easy-to-make herbal formulas for practical use in your home and with your family, friends, and loved ones.
http://www.blogtalkradio.com/nursehealer/2010/10/03/practical-aromatherapy

  • Practical Aromatherapy Class Outline and Resources (with links and downloads)
  • http://www.blogtalkradio.com/nursehealer/blog/2010/10/03/practical-aromatherapy-class-outline

New Dimensions of Meditation Class Online (BlogTalk Radio Show Archive)
This class is on new dimensions of meditation. You will learn about meditation as a spiritual practice. Meditation can promote well-being and the awakening of consciousness. It can bring amazing clarity and immediate resolution. Various methods of meditation from the simplest form that can be done by anyone at any time to more complex methods designed for specific purposes will be discussed. Learn to transcend the physical plane and become the magnificent spiritual being that you truly are in all your splendor as you connect with ethereal realms in the sweet music of the angels.
http://www.blogtalkradio.com/nursehealer/2010/09/19/new-dimensions-of-meditation

  • New Dimensions of Meditation Class Outline and Resources (with links and downloads)
  • http://www.blogtalkradio.com/nursehealer/blog/2010/09/19/new-dimensions-of-meditation-show-notes

Earth Medicine Class Online (BlogTalk Radio Show Archive)
This class is on Earth medicine (plant & animal spirits). You will experience connection with Earth Wisdom as you honor the nature spirits of plants and animals. You will learn to use herbs and plants in ceremony and for personal transformation. Plant Spirit Healing is a return to the ancient Shamanic ways of our ancestors. We are helped by plant and animal spirits in many endeavors. As we become quiet and listen to their subtle voices, we can experience a world beyond our world as we know it. Learn many aspects of plant and animal spirits and the true meaning of “Earth Medicine.”
http://www.blogtalkradio.com/nursehealer/2010/08/01/earth-medicine

  • Earth Medicine Class Outline and Resources (with links and downloads)
  • http://www.blogtalkradio.com/nursehealer/blog/2010/08/01/earth-medicine-class-resources

Spiritual Fasting Class Online (BlogTalk Radio Show Archive)
This class is on spiritual fasting, fasting with a divine purpose. There are many reasons to fast for brief periods of time; but a spiritual fast differs immensely from a health fast. Although the body goes without food during a spiritual fast, it does not have to suffer the effects of malnutrition. I cannot explain this scientifically; but I can attest to it through personal experience. The spiritual fast nourishes the body, mind, and spirit. Certain elements of the spiritual fast are paramount to the heightened spiritual experience. In this class, the essential elements of the spiritual fast will be discussed. Know what amazing blessings one can receive through spiritually fasting and how to enhance the spiritual experience.
http://www.blogtalkradio.com/nursehealer/2010/07/04/spiritual-fasting

  • Spiritual Fasting Class Outline and Resources (with links and downloads)
  • http://www.blogtalkradio.com/nursehealer/blog/2010/07/04/spiritual-fasting-show-notes

Sacred Space Class Online (BlogTalk Radio Show Archive)
This class is on the sacred space that we are and that we exist within. As we accept and honor the sacredness of life, we bring the sacred into all that we do. We may think of sacred places, such as a church or burial ground. We may rightfully regard our homes as sacred when we treat them with respect and honor. But there is sacredness in life itself. To be sacred is to be declared holy, worthy of respect, dedicated or devoted to a purpose, consecrated. We may not always think of life in this way; but it appropriate and honorable to do so. When we consider life sacred, we cannot hate another, for within them is sacredness. We give honest sincere appreciation for the food we eat, being thankful for the plants and animals whose sacred purpose it was to provide our food. Considering the sacredness of life in every moment is choosing a way of life, an approach to meeting each life experience in every moment. It is recognizing that our home is holy ground, and honoring it as such. With this mindset, recognizing that we maneuver through life in the sacred space of our existence surrounds us with peace and calm in the midst of any life experience and provides clarity, hope, and joy. See the blog notes in Archived Episodes for links to free downloads.
http://www.blogtalkradio.com/nursehealer/2010/06/06/sacred-space

  • Sacred Space Class Outline and Resources (with links and downloads)
  • http://www.blogtalkradio.com/nursehealer/blog/2010/06/06/sacred-space-class-handouts

Living with the Paranormal Class Online (BlogTalk Radio Show Archive)
This class is on living with the paranormal. It will address both positive and negative paranormal experiences and explain how and why these things happen in our lives. The class is designed for ordinary people attempting to understand the paranormal; but is also suitable for paranormal investigators, psychics, spiritual advisers, and counselors interested in helping their clients to deal with the unexplained phenomena in their lives. There is no prerequisite for this class, and it is suitable for people from any background, religion, or belief system.
http://www.blogtalkradio.com/nursehealer/2010/05/02/living-with-the-paranormal

Various methods of meditation from the simplest form that can be done by anyone at any time to more complex methods designed for specific purposes will be discussed. Learn to transcend the physical plane and become the magnificent spiritual being that you truly are in all your splendor as you connect with ethereal realms in the sweet music of the angels.
http://www.blogtalkradio.com/nursehealer/2010/09/19/new-dimensions-of-meditation

  • New Dimensions of Meditation Class Outline and Resources (with links and downloads)
  • http://www.blogtalkradio.com/nursehealer/blog/2010/09/19/new-dimensions-of-meditation-show-notes

Earth Medicine Class Online (BlogTalk Radio Show Archive)
This class is on Earth medicine (plant & animal spirits). You will experience connection with Earth Wisdom as you honor the nature spirits of plants and animals. You will learn to use herbs and plants in ceremony and for personal transformation. Plant Spirit Healing is a return to the ancient Shamanic ways of our ancestors. We are helped by plant and animal spirits in many endeavors. As we become quiet and listen to their subtle voices, we can experience a world beyond our world as we know it. Learn many aspects of plant and animal spirits and the true meaning of “Earth Medicine.”
http://www.blogtalkradio.com/nursehealer/2010/08/01/earth-medicine

  • Earth Medicine Class Outline and Resources (with links and downloads)
  • http://www.blogtalkradio.com/nursehealer/blog/2010/08/01/earth-medicine-class-resources

Spiritual Fasting Class Online (BlogTalk Radio Show Archive)
This class is on spiritual fasting, fasting with a divine purpose. There are many reasons to fast for brief periods of time; but a spiritual fast differs immensely from a health fast. Although the body goes without food during a spiritual fast, it does not have to suffer the effects of malnutrition. I cannot explain this scientifically; but I can attest to it through personal experience. The spiritual fast nourishes the body, mind, and spirit. Certain elements of the spiritual fast are paramount to the heightened spiritual experience. In this class, the essential elements of the spiritual fast will be discussed. Know what amazing blessings one can receive through spiritually fasting and how to enhance the spiritual experience.
http://www.blogtalkradio.com/nursehealer/2010/07/04/spiritual-fasting

  • Spiritual Fasting Class Outline and Resources (with links and downloads)
  • http://www.blogtalkradio.com/nursehealer/blog/2010/07/04/spiritual-fasting-show-notes

Sacred Space Class Online (BlogTalk Radio Show Archive)
This class is on the sacred space that we are and that we exist within. As we accept and honor the sacredness of life, we bring the sacred into all that we do. We may think of sacred places, such as a church or burial ground. We may rightfully regard our homes as sacred when we treat them with respect and honor. But there is sacredness in life itself. To be sacred is to be declared holy, worthy of respect, dedicated or devoted to a purpose, consecrated. We may not always think of life in this way; but it appropriate and honorable to do so. When we consider life sacred, we cannot hate another, for within them is sacredness. We give honest sincere appreciation for the food we eat, being thankful for the plants and animals whose sacred purpose it was to provide our food. Considering the sacredness of life in every moment is choosing a way of life, an approach to meeting each life experience in every moment. It is recognizing that our home is holy ground, and honoring it as such. With this mindset, recognizing that we maneuver through life in the sacred space of our existence surrounds us with peace and calm in the midst of any life experience and provides clarity, hope, and joy. See the blog notes in Archived Episodes for links to free downloads.
http://www.blogtalkradio.com/nursehealer/2010/06/06/sacred-space

  • Sacred Space Class Outline and Resources (with links and downloads)
  • http://www.blogtalkradio.com/nursehealer/blog/2010/06/06/sacred-space-class-handouts

Living with the Paranormal Class Online (BlogTalk Radio Show Archive)
This class is on living with the paranormal. It will address both positive and negative paranormal experiences and explain how and why these things happen in our lives. The class is designed for ordinary people attempting to understand the paranormal; but is also suitable for paranormal investigators, psychics, spiritual advisers, and counselors interested in helping their clients to deal with the unexplained phenomena in their lives. There is no prerequisite for this class, and it is suitable for people from any background, religion, or belief system.
http://www.blogtalkradio.com/nursehealer/2010/05/02/living-with-the-paranormal

  • Living with the Paranormal Class Outline and Resources (with links and downloads)
  • http://www.blogtalkradio.com/nursehealer/blog/2010/05/02/outline-for-living-with-the-paranormal

Releasing Undesired Attachments Class Online (BlogTalk Radio Show Archive)
This class is on releasing undesired attachments. Learn basic to more advanced methods of releasing nonserving thought patterns, negative energies, spirit attachment, and more. Learn how to be free of intruding thought processes, psychic attack, and lingering residue. Topics may include energy "vampires", spirit releasement, and remote depossession. Know how to clear your energy field of all unwanted intruders.
http://www.blogtalkradio.com/nursehealer/2010/03/14/releasing-undesired-attachments

  • Releasing Undesired Attachments Class Outline and Resources (with links and downloads)
  • http://www.blogtalkradio.com/nursehealer/blog/2010/03/14/releasing-undesired-attachments-outline

Raising Your Vibration Class Online (BlogTalk Radio Show Archive)
This class will teach you or validate for you how you may raise your own personal vibrational frequency to connect quickly and easily with your higher self, your guides, angels, and even God or Source. This technique can be used for healing yourself and others because tremendous healing takes place at these higher frequencies. It can be used to enhance spirituality, psychic ability, communication with Spirit, and clarity in hearing, seeing, and knowing the answers to our prayers, petitions, and questions.
http://www.blogtalkradio.com/nursehealer/2010/02/07/raising-your-vibration

  • Raising Your Vibration Class Outline and Resources (with links and downloads)
  • http://www.blogtalkradio.com/nursehealer/blog/2010/10/04/raising-your-vibration-class-resources

Preparedness Class Online (BlogTalk Radio Show Archive)
This is a 30 minute condensed class on emergency preparedness and food storage. You will learn how to prepare a 72-hour emergency kit (and why), food storage basics (including shelflife), and how to develop a preparedness mindset. There is no need for fear when you have considered many of the what-ifs, resolved a manageable contingency plan for potential challenges, and allowed trust to bring you peace of mind. Preparedness instills within us trust of ourselves, trust of our intuition, trust of our decisions both pre-established and in the moment, and trust of a higher power. When challenge arrives, you can choose fear or faith. The preparedness mindset is one of faith. (This class is the condensed version of the 2-hour class in person on May 23, 2009) Show time is June 6, 2009 at 1 PM Central (check your timezone).

item.title: Sacred Space Class Resources - Oct 03,2010
item.description:
Sacred Space Class Handouts

This class is on the sacred space that we are and that we exist within. As we accept and honor the sacredness of life, we bring the sacred into all that we do. We may think of sacred places, such as a church or burial ground. We may rightfully regard our homes as sacred when we treat them with respect and honor. But there is sacredness in life itself. To be sacred is to be declared holy, worthy of respect, dedicated or devoted to a purpose, consecrated. We may not always think of life in this way; but it appropriate and honorable to do so. When we consider life sacred, we cannot hate another, for within them is sacredness. We give honest sincere appreciation for the food we eat, being thankful for the plants and animals whose sacred purpose it was to provide our food. Considering the sacredness of life in every moment is choosing a way of life, an approach to meeting each life experience in every moment. It is recognizing that our home is holy ground, and honoring it as such. With this mindset, recognizing that we maneuver through life in the sacred space of our existence surrounds us with peace and calm in the midst of any life experience and provides clarity, hope, and joy.

Handouts

(1) Sacred Gifts and Sacredness by Mary Catherine Miller (1 page)
http://nursehealer.com/Sacred_Gifts_and_Sacredness.doc

(2) Oneness~ Sacredness of Life ~ Galactic Consciousness
Trifold brochure by Mary Catherine Miller ~ Art by Mannon C Martin http://mannoncm.deviantart.com/ (2 pages)
http://www.lulu.com/content/e-book/oneness%7e-sacredness-of-life-%7e-galactic-consciousness/7332258

(3) Egg of Protection Prayer By PJ Spur, CHt. ~ http://www.soulrevelations.com (1 page)
http://nursehealer.com/ProtectionPrayerEgg.doc

(4) Spiritual Practice By Mary Catherine “Cathy” Miller ~ NurseHealer.com (4 pages)
http://www.lulu.com/product/brochure/spiritual-practice/10919869

http://nursehealer.com/Mission_Statement.doc

(6) Sacred Space Development Group Flier (1 page)
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/SacredSpaceDevelopmentGroup/

or go to http://nursehealer.com/services

item.title: Spiritual Fasting - Jul 04,2010
item.description:
This class is on spiritual fasting, fasting with a divine purpose. There are many reasons to fast for brief periods of time; but a spiritual fast differs immensely from a health fast. Although the body goes without food during a spiritual fast, it does not have to suffer the effects of malnutrition. I cannot explain this scientifically; but I can attest to it through personal experience. The spiritual fast nourishes the body, mind, and spirit. Certain elements of the spiritual fast are paramount to the heightened spiritual experience. In this class, the essential elements of the spiritual fast will be discussed. Know what amazing blessings one can receive through spiritually fasting and how to enhance the spiritual experience. Class Handouts: (1) Spiritual Fasting by Dr. Robert Sniadach (2) 7 Basic Steps to Fasting and Prayer (3) “Chapter 25: Fasting,” Gospel Principles http://www.lds.org/ Additional Resources: 1) Sacred Gifts and Sacredness by Mary Catherine Miller (2) Oneness Trifold brochure by Mary Catherine Miller

item.title: Sacred Space - Jun 06,2010
item.description:
This class is on the sacred space that we are and that we exist within. As we accept and honor the sacredness of life, we bring the sacred into all that we do. We may think of sacred places, such as a church or burial ground. We may rightfully regard our homes as sacred when we treat them with respect and honor. But there is sacredness in life itself. To be sacred is to be declared holy, worthy of respect, dedicated or devoted to a purpose, consecrated. We may not always think of life in this way; but it appropriate and honorable to do so. When we consider life sacred, we cannot hate another, for within them is sacredness. We give honest sincere appreciation for the food we eat, being thankful for the plants and animals whose sacred purpose it was to provide our food. Considering the sacredness of life in every moment is choosing a way of life, an approach to meeting each life experience in every moment. It is recognizing that our home is holy ground, and honoring it as such. With this mindset, recognizing that we maneuver through life in the sacred space of our existence surrounds us with peace and calm in the midst of any life experience and provides clarity, hope, and joy. See the blog notes in Archived Episodes for links to free downloads. Class Outline and Resources NurseHealer Classes and Workshops NurseHealer Events

item.title: Living with the Paranormal - May 02,2010
item.description:
This class is on living with the paranormal. It will address both positive and negative paranormal experiences and explain how and why these things happen in our lives. The class is designed for ordinary people attempting to understand the paranormal; but is also suitable for paranormal investigators, psychics, spiritual advisers, and counselors interested in helping their clients to deal with the unexplained phenomena in their lives. There is no prerequisite for this class, and it is suitable for people from any background, religion, or belief system. item.title: Preparedness - Jun 06,2009
item.description:
This is a 30 minute condensed class on emergency preparedness and food storage. You will learn how to prepare a 72-hour emergency kit (and why), food storage basics (including shelflife), and how to develop a preparedness mindset. There is no need for fear when you have considered many of the what-ifs, resolved a manageable contingency plan for potential challenges, and allowed trust to bring you peace of mind. Preparedness instills within us trust of ourselves, trust of our intuition, trust of our decisions both pre-established and in the moment, and trust of a higher power. When challenge arrives, you can choose fear or faith. The preparedness mindset is one of faith. Preparedness Class Outline and Resources Class Outlines are available at NurseHealer.com with all class resources. Vote on or suggest future classes at nursehealer.com/classes (click on “Survey.”) Download or purchase audio, video, and written materials at NurseHealer.com.
